topics.body:
Y'know I've been reminising about Disney World for a bit, and there's one thing I regret not seeing.
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221133556/disney/images/7/71/Lucky_the_Dinosaur_at_Hong_Kong_Disneyland.jpg!
This is Lucky. He is a dinosaur. In reality he is one of the most sophisticated audio-animatronics on the planet. He is completely automated. He remains one of the most sophisticated audio-animatronics on the planet. And he was built over ten years ago.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

Kind of. He still needs a "handler" but given time I think that Disney could create a a fully automated solo animatronic. He's still really cool. Both on a child level because he's a fucking dinosaur, but from a more mature perspective he represents what technology can achieve.
